name: Desktop Shrine
description:
Game presentation

Desktop Shrine is a minimalist and interactive wallpaper where you and your cultists build a shrine.

Desktop will be added on top of your windows desktop, each of your desktop shortcut will be represented has a cultist. Use your cultist to launch you applications as you normally do, but every time you do so you will earn points to improve your shrine.

Context

This game has been made in 2 days for #gmtkjam 2020, the theme was : Out of control.

How to quit ?

You can quit Desktop Shrine by going on your taskbar :

Next update

I will rework graphical assets to improve the overall look.
